NEW FEATURES: `color` command now has a `--random` option to generate random color instead of specifying a color.
`textUnMute` command now has a `--server` option to text unmute users who were text muted in the server globally, using the `--server` option of the `textMute` command.
Messages in starboard will now show a link to the original message.
IMPROVED FEATURES: `cite` command will show the link to the message even if there's no content in the cited message.
